title: Endings Guide
content: of Karlach. When successful, she will procure the spear of Lady Shar and grips it tightly as if she's ready for anything that is to come, and yet, she throws away the spear, abandoning her lifelong quest. Shadowheart now fears that she will be disowned, and she fears what will happen next to her. Nightsong tells her that her fate is not fixed and to lay a friendly hand on her, to fight the battle that has been awaiting her, the one that will take your party to Ketheric Thorm, back to Moonrise To
